Tmux Cheatsheet

May 16, 2018

Start Tmux

> tumx

Session

Create a new session with a name

> tmux new -s <session-name>

List of existing session

> tmux ls

Attach to the existing session

> tmux attach -t <session name/number>

Rename tmux session

> tmux rename-session -t <previous name/no> <new-name>

Detach when inside tmux without ending the session

> tmux detach

Split Pane

Vertical split

> C-b, %

Horizontal split

> C-b, "

Navigate Pane

> C-b, <arrow key>

Closing pane

> exit
> C-d

Windows

Creating new window:

> C-b, c

Navigate windows

Previous window

> C-b, p

Next window

> C-b, n

> C-b, <number>
